initializationAction: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:data/testformoney');
escapeAction: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:data/removemoneytags');

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Welcome! I sell high-end decorative items for your base!

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Which items are you interested in?

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Which items are you interested in?

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Pastures allow your Pokemon to roam around in your base. Would you like to buy a Pasture for $8500?

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Money=8500..}] run give @s cobblemon:pasture 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Money=8500..}] run playsound minecraft:entity.experience_orb.pickup ambient @s ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Money=8500..}] run scoreboard players remove @s Money 8500');
q.dialogue.set_page('buyend');
q.dialogue.set_page('buy1');

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Would you like to buy a Amethyst Cluster for $2200?

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Money=2200..}] run give @s minecraft:amethyst_cluster 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Money=2200..}] run playsound minecraft:entity.experience_orb.pickup ambient @s ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1');

q.dialogue.set_page('buyend');
q.dialogue.set_page('buy1');

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Lovely. And here you are. Happy decorating!

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:data/removemoneytags');
q.dialogue.close();
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:data/removemoneytags');
q.dialogue.close();
